name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms VII with Power Up Kit
summary:
"Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅶ with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅶ," which was released in 2000 as the 7th game in the series. 
With "Enjoy the lives of all the Romance Warriors!" as the theme, in this version players can play any of the officers that appear in the game. Experience a range of lifestyles through the lives of the officers; Ruler, Strategist, Governor, Officer, Free Officer, they're all available. Immerse yourself in your favorite Warrior and plunge into the chaos of the Three Kingdoms.
